Cumulative and current firmware and drivers for the Surface USB4 Dock for Business. This firmware and driver package contains drivers for all of the components in the Surface USB4 Dock for Business, as well as updates to the system firmware that have been released via Windows Update. These drivers and firmware are compatible with Windows 10 and Windows 11, including Enterprise versions. The driver MSI files include all of the drivers and firmware needed to deploy custom images of Windows on your Surface devices.
    The "Date Published" represents the last time this page was updated, so the file you are downloading may be older than the actual "Date Published".

Surface update history
systemRequirementsSection: Surface USB4 Dock for Business required for compatibility with these drivers. These drivers and firmware are compatible with Windows 10 and Windows 11, including Enterprise versions.
installInstructionSection: Use these drivers and firmware to prepare your custom images for enterprise deployment, or to enable support for Surface USB4 Dock for Business offline, without internet access or Windows Update. The MSI will install all relevant drivers automatically.
